title: KKR Chief Operating Officer Ryan Stork Steps Down From Role
description: KKR & Co. Chief Operating Officer Ryan Stork is stepping down from his role effective immediately, the firm said in a regulatory filing.
content: KKR & Co. Chief Operating Officer Ryan Stork is stepping down from his role effective immediately, the firm said in a regulatory filing.
